title: Bimaximal mixing
text:
Bimaximal mixing refers to a proposed form of the <a href="lepton%20mixing%20matrix">lepton mixing matrix</a>. It is characterized by the formula_1 <a href="neutrino">neutrino</a> being a "bimaximal mixture" of formula_2 and formula_3 and being completely decoupled from the formula_4, i.e. an uniform mixture of formula_2 and formula_3. The formula_4 is consequently a uniform mixture of formula_8 and formula_9. Other notable properties are the <a href="symmetries">symmetries</a> between the formula_2 and formula_3 <a href="Flavour%20%28particle%20physics%29">flavours</a> and formula_8 and formula_9 <a href="mass">mass</a> <a href="eigenstates">eigenstates</a> and an absence of <a href="CP%20violation">CP violation</a>.
